text: We can hardly fathom the incredible amount of clothes and accessories that exist in the individual studio - apartment - sized closets of each of the Kardashian - Jenner women. To consider the wardrobe that Kim, Khlo√©, Kendall, Kylie, Kourtney, and Kris have combined among them is downright mind - blowing. We can probably agree that we'd jump at an opportunity to raid any one of their walk - ins, which lucky for them is their sisterly birthright. Through the years of KUTWK, we've watched them all swap, steal, share and squabble over clothes just like all female family members do. But what's it like to ` ` borrow'' from your mom and sister when everything they own is seriously expensive, if not one - of -
